name: [Post-Compo] Disease In Sewers
description:
/!\ Please wait if the loading seems to freeze, a big file may be loading /!\

This version has been made the next day of the compo, in order to fix problems that made the game very hard to play:

Changelog 04/14: Fixed stuff and made the game less difficult

  • Game over now reset all diseases but remove all money
  • Diseases in first level where not shown correctly 
  • Money wasn't shown correctly
  • Shop was broken 
  • Lower prices at the shop
  • The end was starting a level earlier
If you want to play at the original version (harder and buggier): https://yvanor.itch.io/disease-in-sewers

Thanks for playing, don't forget to rate and to leave a feedback !

Game: Robert fell into the sewers. The problem is.. It's the most dangerous one in the world ! These sewers are full of traps and of diseases. You should avoid to have too much diseases at the same time, otherwise Robert may die ! Thankfully, Iov will always be here to heal you, if you have money of course.. Heal your diseases quickly, because the more you have, the worse it will get !

Hints: Press E to interact with items such as doors, buttons, chests or climb at ladders ! Don't forget to heal yourself after each level in order to have as few diseases as you can.

Controls:

Keyboard:   * W/Z to jump  * A/Q and D to move  * S to crouch  * E to interact
